title: what exactly are the entries listed below the "recently closed windows" menu, if not recently closed tabs?

title: Firefox 130.0 (nixos) - Why does dragging and dropping a tab in Firefox create a copy instead of moving the tab?
content: I updated a few days ago and I noticed that dragging and dropping a tab is creating a copy of the tab in the place where I drop it, instead of moving the tab which was the previous behavior in older versions.
